document.masterDocTitle: Revision of the Agrilus purpurifrons species-group (Coleoptera, Buprestidae, Agrilinae)

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Revision of the Agrilus purpurifrons species-group (Coleoptera, Buprestidae, Agrilinae)

bibRefCitation.author: Deyrolle, H.
bibRefCitation.refString: Deyrolle, H. (1864) Description des Buprestides de la Malaisie recueillis par M. Wallace. Annales de la Societe Entomologique de Belgique, 8, 1 - 272, 305 - 312.

subSubSection.paragraph: Kerremans 1900a : 81 (faunal records; Indonesia : North Sumatra (Nias Island))

Type material.
Agrilus purpurifrons Deyrolle, 1864
. Described from inexplicit number of specimens (ST). Type locality: “Bornéo”. Type specimens : Lectotype designated by Jendek (1998) .

Agrilus viator Kerremans, 1912
. Described from inexplicit number of specimens (ST). Type locality: “not given [Borneo is cited in the title of the publication]”. Type specimens: Lectotype designated by Jendek (2001) .

Agrilus penangensis Obenberger, 1936
. Described from inexplicit number of specimens (ST). Type locality: “ Penang ”.
Type specimens
: Lectotype designated by Jendek (2007) .
